user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I want to create a promotional video for it. Can you suggest some royalty-free background music that I can use in the video? Also, I'm interested in the statistics of the top NBA players. Can you fetch their stats for the current season?

TaskList.description: Search and retrieve a list of royalty-free background music suitable for promotional videos.
Fetch the current season statistics for the top NBA players.
